Author: crazyrunner92
Text: Think about how proud you'll be of yourself of you don't binge the night before. After long enough, the nightly habit of binging will likely go away. It won't be a habit.

Author: TerribleExcuse
Text: If you know that the evening is when you often "cave in", it may not be a bad idea to actually go to bed earlier and in exchange get up earlier to "get shit done". If you're dreading having to be productive in the evening all day, then taking out the stress by eating may become all the more enticing.  There's a possibility that you may just move your bingeing time forward by a few hours, but you won't know until you try, right?
